channel.title: PI very small code help :)
channel.description:
Hey guys i have a very small problem that i need help with which is : i need to make an npc that takes 100 clay ores from the player in jail and tele him only if he had the 100 clay in invent with him. i added the npc and made the text that the npc will say when the player talks to him in dialoguehandler "sendNpcChat4("Hello there "+c.playerName+"!","Mine 100 Clay and talk to me to get out of jail!","Remember you can't tele, or talk.","Start working and learn not to break the rules next time.", c.talkingNpc, "King Lathas"); c.nextChat = 210;". but in clicking buttons i need to add the code that makes the npc do the action of taking the 100 clay and tele him. :confused:
Thanks In Advance :) !!

item.title: PI very small code help :)
item.dc:creator: @II_john_II II john II
item.description:
@II_john_II wrote:

Scape-JAVA:

You have to make your npc check the players inventory for the 100 clay with an (if statement?).

Well i know that but im asking for that statement i need the statement that takes the ores from invent and teles back home.

Read full topic

item.title: PI very small code help :)
item.dc:creator: @II_john_II II john II
item.description:
@II_john_II wrote:

Hey guys i have a very small problem that i need help with which is :
i need to make an npc that takes 100 clay ores from the player in jail and tele him only if he had the 100 clay in invent with him.
i added the npc and made the text that the npc will say when the player talks to him in dialoguehandler “sendNpcChat4(“Hello there “+c.playerName+”!”,“Mine 100 Clay and talk to me to get out of jail!”,“Remember you can’t tele, or talk.”,“Start working and learn not to break the rules next time.”, c.talkingNpc, “King Lathas”); c.nextChat = 210;”.
but in clicking buttons i need to add the code that makes the npc do the action of taking the 100 clay and tele him.

Thanks In Advance !!

Read full topic
